comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch the Eclipse Search page by going to Help - Search.
2. Ensure you have multiple entries in the Search expression drop down. You may need to search multiple items.
3. Now click inside the drop down, and with the drop down list collapsed, press the up and down arrow keys rapidly multiple times. You will see Unhandled event loop exceptions fill the error log. The same behavior is observed if you use the mouse scroll wheel rather than the up/down error keys.



More information:
